akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 115–97, title I, § 13516(a), Dec. 22, 2017, 131 Stat. 2144]

akn:content.akn:p:
[§ 847. Repealed. Pub. L. 115–97, title I, § 13516(a), Dec. 22, 2017, 131 Stat. 2144]
Section, added Pub. L. 100–647, title VI, § 6077(a), Nov. 10, 1988, 102 Stat. 3707; amended Pub. L. 101–239, title VII, § 7816(n), Dec. 19, 1989, 103 Stat. 2422; Pub. L. 115–97, title I, § 12001(b)(8)(B), Dec. 22, 2017, 131 Stat. 2093, related to special estimated tax payments.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealPub. L. 115–97, title I, § 13516(b), Dec. 22, 2017, 131 Stat. 2144, provided that: “The amendments made by this section [repealing this section] shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2017.”
